title: Hidden Sunlight
description: UNPUBLISHED, Completed Facing a life-changing medical procedure, 14 year old Shay approaches it with the same detachment, confusion and dread that has haunted his emotions for as long as he can recall. Yet what follows instead is something that he could not have anticipated in his craziest dreams, and everything he knows is about to change foreverhttp://www.gayauthors.org/story/stell...
author: Stellar
